description: A basic list stored in JSON format as an array (unnamed) or object (named). Every data element consists of an object with the `type` property, specifying the type (i.e., `integer`, `number`, `string`, `boolean`, `factor`, `ordered`, `date` or `other`). Objects with non-`other` types have a `values` property containing the actual value of the element. Objects of `other` type have a `index` property specifying the 0-based index of `children` to use for this element. `factor` and `ordered` objects have a `levels` property containing a string array of levels. See https://github.com/LTLA/uzuki for more details.

children.description: Child resources referenced from this list, for nested objects of type `other`.

path.description: Relative path of the resource from the root of the project directory.

type.description: Type of file. Local files should be present in the same project directory.

compression.description: Type of compression applied to the file.

is_child.description: Is this a child document, only to be interpreted in the context of the parent document from which it is linked? This may have implications for search and metadata requirements.

path.description: Path to the file in the project directory.
